nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(device_name) AS 'Device Name', latest(src_addr) AS 'Device IP', latest(kentik.snmp.Uptime) / 8640000 AS 'Uptime (Days)', latest(SysObjectID) AS 'SysObjectID', latest(entity.type) AS 'Entity Type', latest(instrumentation.name) AS 'Ktranslate Profile', latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update', latest(PollingHealth) AS 'Polling Health', latest(PollingHealthReason) AS 'Health Reason' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Current CPU Utilization %' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Current System Memory Utilization %' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa' and memory_pool_name = 'System memory'
FROM Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Min CPU', max(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Max CPU', average(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Average CPU' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES
FROM Metric SELECT average(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Average Memory' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES facet memory_pool_name
FROM Metric SELECT latest(failover_status) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa' facet failover_description, failover_status_detail
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.current_firewall_connections) AS 'Current Firewall Connections' SINCE 10 MINUTES AGO COMPARE WITH 1 DAY AGO
FROM Metric SELECT max(kentik.snmp.current_firewall_connections) AS 'Connections' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.IfInUtilization) AS 'RX %', latest(kentik.snmp.IfOutUtilization) AS 'TX %', latest(if_OperStatus) AS 'Operational Status', latest(kentik.snmp.ifInErrorPercent) AS 'RX Error %', latest(kentik.snmp.ifOutErrorPercent) AS 'TX Error %' FACET if_interface_name AS 'Interface', if_Speed AS 'Interface Speed' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa' LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT rate(max(kentik.snmp.ifHCOutOctets) * 8 / 1000 / 1000, 1 second) AS 'Mbps' FACET concat(if_interface_name, ' ', if_Alias) TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa' LIMIT 10

FROM Metric SELECT rate(max(kentik.snmp.ifHCInOctets) * 8 / 1000 / 1000, 1 second) AS 'Mbps' FACET concat(if_interface_name, ' ', if_Alias) TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa' LIMIT 10

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.cufwUrlfRequestsNumProcessed) as 'cufwUrlfRequestsNumProcessed', latest(kentik.snmp.cufwUrlfRequestsNumAllowed) as 'cufwUrlfRequestsNumAllowed', latest(kentik.snmp.cufwUrlfRequestsNumDenied) as 'cufwUrlfRequestsNumDenied' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa'

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.crasNumDeclinedSessions) as 'crasNumDeclinedSessions', latest(kentik.snmp.crasNumSessions) as 'crasNumSessions', latest(kentik.snmp.crasNumUsers) as 'crasNumUsers', latest(kentik.snmp.crasNumSetupFailInsufResources) as 'crasNumSetupFailInsufResources' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa'

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.cikeGlobalActiveTunnels) as 'cikeGlobalActiveTunnels', latest(kentik.snmp.cikeGlobalInOctets) as 'cikeGlobalInOctets', latest(kentik.snmp.cikeGlobalInPkts) as 'cikeGlobalInPkts', latest(kentik.snmp.cikeGlobalOutOctets) as 'cikeGlobalOutOctets', latest(kentik.snmp.cikeGlobalOutPkts) as 'cikeGlobalOutPkts' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa'

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.cipSecGlobalActiveTunnels) as 'cipSecGlobalActiveTunnels', latest(kentik.snmp.cipSecGlobalHcInOctets) as 'cipSecGlobalHcInOctets', latest(kentik.snmp.cipSecGlobalInPkts) as 'cipSecGlobalInPkts', latest(kentik.snmp.cipSecGlobalHcOutOctets) as 'cipSecGlobalHcOutOctets', latest(kentik.snmp.cipSecGlobalOutPkts) as 'cipSecGlobalOutPkts' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa'

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.cikePeerActiveTime) as 'cikePeerActiveTime' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa' FACET cikePeerLocalType, cikePeerLocalValue, cikePeerRemoteType, cikePeerRemoteValue, cikePeerLocalAddr, cikePeerRemoteAddr

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.cikeTunActiveTime) as 'cikeTunActiveTime', latest(kentik.snmp.cikeTunInOctets) as 'cikeTunInOctets', latest(kentik.snmp.cikeTunInPkts) as 'cikeTunInPkts', latest(kentik.snmp.cikeTunInDropPkts) as 'cikeTunInDropPkts', latest(kentik.snmp.cikeTunOutOctets) as 'cikeTunOutOctets', latest(kentik.snmp.cikeTunOutPkts) as 'cikeTunOutPkts', latest(kentik.snmp.cikeTunOutDropPkts) as 'cikeTunOutDropPkts', latest(cikeTunStatus) as 'cikeTunStatus' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa' FACET cikeTunLocalType, cikeTunLocalValue, cikeTunLocalAddr, cikeTunLocalName, cikeTunRemoteType, cikeTunRemoteValue, cikeTunRemoteAddr, cikeTunRemoteName, cikeTunNegoMode, cikeTunDiffHellmanGrp, cikeTunEncryptAlgo, cikeTunHashAlgo

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.cipSecTunIkeTunnelAlive) as 'cipSecTunIkeTunnelAlive', latest(kentik.snmp.cipSecTunActiveTime) as 'cipSecTunActiveTime', latest(kentik.snmp.cipSecTunHcInOctets) as 'cipSecTunHcInOctets', latest(kentik.snmp.cipSecTunInPkts) as 'cipSecTunInPkts', latest(kentik.snmp.cipSecTunHcOutOctets) as 'cipSecTunHcOutOctets', latest(kentik.snmp.cipSecTunOutPkts) as 'cipSecTunOutPkts', latest(cipSecTunStatus) as 'cipSecTunStatus' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'cisco-asa' FACET cipSecTunIkeTunnelIndex, cipSecTunLocalAddr, cipSecTunRemoteAddr, cipSecTunKeyType, cipSecTunEncapMode, cipSecTunInSaDiffHellmanGrp, cipSecTunInSaEncryptAlgo, cipSecTunInSaAhAuthAlgo, cipSecTunInSaEspAuthAlgo, cipSecTunInSaDecompAlgo, cipSecTunOutSaDiffHellmanGrp, cipSecTunOutSaEncryptAlgo, cipSecTunOutSaAhAuthAlgo, cipSecTunOutSaEspAuthAlgo, cipSecTunOutSaCompAlgo
